title: Mercury in Gemini
summary: A quick, curious mental weather. Information moves fast, conversations multiply, and connections between topics appear easily. The opportunity is to channel curiosity into useful links instead of scattering attention.

meaning.headline: Thinking is agile, playful, and eager to explore options.

frames.text: Mercury in Gemini boosts curiosity, adaptability, and appetite for dialogue.
It favors learning through variety and exchanging information across networks.
Short-form communication and rapid pivots are easier than deep dives.
Humor and lightness help ideas land.
Every idea needs to be pursued or shared immediately.

frictions: Shallow processing that misses key details
opportunities: Summarizing complex topics into digestible bits
Experimenting with new tools or shortcuts
Asking questions that reveal useful data

do: Keep notes to track ideas before moving on.
Use short check-ins instead of long meetings.
Build small prototypes to test concepts.
Rotate tasks to stay engaged without losing priorities.
Practice active listening to balance the talk.
avoid: Dropping commitments when a new topic appears
Treating multitasking as the only option

reusable_lines.text: Curiosity is highâ€”capture ideas so they do not vanish.
Short, clear exchanges beat long speeches today.

forbidden_claims: Predictions about gossip or social outcomes
allowed_framing: Supportive framing: can spark learning and connection
Agency-forward language: you choose which threads to follow
Contextual framing: variety helps when paired with focus tools

sources: Mercury as mind/communication archetype in daily cycles
